code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/api/notes';var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var request=axios.post(baseUrl,newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);};var removePerson=function removePerson(id,person){if(window.confirm("Delete ".concat(person.name))){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,removePerson:removePerson};
